verbs.description: An impromptu conversation at a cocktail party [V: could] be behind the assertion from former Trump aide Michael Caputo that there was another informant sniffing around the campaign .

[ARG1: An impromptu conversation at a cocktail party] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: be] [ARG2: behind the assertion from former Trump aide Michael Caputo that there was another informant sniffing around the campaign] .
An impromptu conversation at a cocktail party could be behind the assertion from former Trump aide Michael Caputo that there [V: was] [ARG1: another informant sniffing around the campaign] .
An impromptu conversation at a cocktail party could be behind the assertion from former Trump aide Michael Caputo that there was [ARG0: another informant] [V: sniffing] [ARG1: around the campaign] .
